definition: to be successful in business/professional success
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
surname Ye
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng

sentences.english: He incarnates all the qualities of a successful .
sentences.chinese: 他表现出了事业有成的所具有的一切品质。

sentences.english: Some high-achieving women find themselves forgoing families.
sentences.chinese: 一些事业有成的妇女发现自己忽视了家庭。

sentences.english: ESTHER, a successful career in the United States back to the new developing pharmaceutical business.
sentences.chinese: ESTHER在美国事业有成，回新开拓药业生意。

sentences.english: Mnay years passed and the young man was very successful in business.
sentences.chinese: 多年以后，年轻人已事业有成。

sentences.english: He is a successful enterpriser with a breadth of vision.
sentences.chinese: 他是位眼光广阔，事业有成的企业家。

sentences.english: I have a successful career, such as the day is when I feel elated.
sentences.chinese: 等我事业有成的那天，也就是我扬眉吐气的时候。

sentences.english: How many tools or material things do you need to thrive?
sentences.chinese: 为了使事业有成你需要多少工具及物质上的东西？

sentences.english: What do you need to thrive?
sentences.chinese: 什么可以使你事业有成？

sentences.english: Finally wish everybody had new happy life with your family.
sentences.chinese: 祝大家事业有成，合家幸福。

sentences.english: Can you do well by doing good?
sentences.chinese: 你能通过做善事而事业有成吗？

sentences.english: What process did you go through to become successful in your career?
sentences.chinese: 你都经历了哪些才事业有成？

sentences.english: A group of middle-aged people, who are very successful in their careers, got together to visit their old university professor.
sentences.chinese: 一群事业有成的中年人一起去探望以前大学的老教授。
